name: githubgameoff2017
description:
This is a game submission for GitHubGameOff2017 Game Jam on the theme THROBACK.

Thorwback in this game means go to the last location.

You can find the source code of course on GITHUB  by following this link https://github.com/albator2018/GitHubGameOff2017

The rules are simple and uses only one button is the left click, so :

  • Left click on the map until you arrive at home
  • If you hit a bad guy it THROWBACK

Have fun !
